maqras.text: 12|7|Abasya'i i'usupha ebam tamra bha'idera [1] ghatanaya jijnasudera jan'ya aneka nidarsana rayeche [2].
12|8|Smarana karuna, tara balechila, ‘amadera pitara kache i'usupha ebam tara bha'i to amadera ceye besi priya, athaca amara ekati sanhata dala; amadera pita to spasta bibhrantite'i ache [1].
12|9|‘Tomara i'usuphake hatya kara athaba kono sthane take phele asa, tahale tomadera pitara drsti sudhu tomadera dike'i nibista habe ebam tarapara tomara bhala loka haye yabe [1].‘
12|10|Tadera madhye ekajana balala, ‘tomara i'usuphake hatya karo na ebam yadi kichu karate'i ca'o tabe take kono kupera gabhire niksepa kara, yatridalera ke'u take tule niye yabe [1].’
12|11|Tara balala, ‘he amadera pita! Apanara ki halo ye, i'usuphera byapare apani amaderake nirapada mane karachena na, athaca amara to tara subhakanksi
12|12|‘apani agami kala take amadera sathe pathana, se sanande ghoraphera karabe o kheladhula karabe [1]. Ara amara abasya'i tara raksanabeksanakari haba.’
12|13|Tini balalena, ‘eta amake abasya'i kasta debe ye tomara take niye yabe ebam ami asanka kari take nekare bagha kheye phelabe, ara tomara tara prati amanoyogi thakabe.’
12|14|Tara balala, ‘amara ekati sanhata dala ha'oya sattbe'o yadi nekare bagha take kheye phele, tabe to amara abasya'i ksatigrasta.’

12|15|Atahpara tara yakhana take niye gela ebam kupera gabhire niksepa karate ekamata hala, ara e abasthaya amara take janiye dilama, ‘tumi taderake e kajera katha abasya'i bale debe’; athaca tara ta upalabdhi karate parabe na [1].
12|16|Ara tara ratera prathama prahare kamdate kamdate tadera pitara kache asala.

12|17|Tara balala, ‘he amadera pita! Amara daurera pratiyogita karate giyechilama [1] ebam i'usuphake amadera malapatrera kache rekhe giyechilama, atahpara nekare bagha take kheye pheleche; kintu apani to amaderake bisbasa karabena na yadi'o amara satyabadi ha'i.’

12|18|Ara tara tara jamaya mithya rakta lepana kare enechila. Tini balalena, ‘na, baram tomadera mana tomadera jan'ya ekati kahini sajiye diyeche. Kaje'i uttama dhairya'i ami grahana karaba. Ara tomara ya barnana karacha se bisaye ekamatra allah‌i amara sahayyasthala [1].

12|19|Ara eka dala yatridala asala, atahpara tara tadera pani sangrahakake pathale se tara panira balati namiye dila. Se bale uthala. ‘Ki sukhabara! E ye eka kisora! [1] Ebam tara take panyarupe lukiye rakhala [2]. Ara tara ya karechila se bisaye allah‌ sabisesa abagata [3].
12|20|Ara tara take bikri karala sbalpa mulye, matra kayeka dirahamera binimaye [1] ebam tara chila tara byapare anagrahi [2].

12|21|Ara misarera ye byakti take kinechila, se tara strike balala, ‘era thakara sam'manajanaka byabastha kara, sambhabata se amadera upakare asabe ba amara eke putrarupe'o grahana karate pari [1].‘Ara ebhabe'i amara i'usuphake se dese pratisthita karalama [2]; ebam yate amara take sbapnera byakhya siksa de'i [3]. Ara allah‌ tamra kaja sampadane apratihata; kintu adhikansa manusa jane na [4].
12|22|Ara se yakhana purna yaubane upanita hala takhana amara take hikamata o jnana dana karalama [1]. Ara ebhabe'i amara ihasanakariderake puraskrta kari [2].

12|23|Ara tini ye strilokera ghare chilena se take ku-prarocana dila ebam darajagulo bandha kare dila, ara balala, ‘asa [1].‘Tini balalena, ‘ami allah‌ra asraya prarthana karachi [2], niscaya tini amara maniba; tini amara thakara sundara byabastha karechena. Niscaya yalimara saphalakama haya na [3].’

12|24|Ara se mahila to tara prati asakta hayechila ebam tini'o tara prati asakta [1] haye paratena yadi na tini tara rabera nidarsana dekhate petena [2]. Ebhabe'i (ta hayechila), yate amara tara theke mandakaja o aslilata dura kare de'i [3]. Tini to chilena amadera mukhalisa ba bisud'dhacitta bandadera antarbhukta.

12|25|Ara tara ubhaye daure darajara dike gela ebam strilokati pichana hate tara jama chimre phelala, ara tara du’jana strilokatira sbamike darajara kache pela. Strilokati balala, ‘ye tomara paribarera sathe manda kaja karara iccha kare tara jan'ya karagare prerana ba an'ya kono yantranadayaka sasti chara ara ki danda hate pare?’

12|26|I'usupha balalena, ‘se-i amake ku-prarocana diyeche.’ Ara strilokatira paribarera ekajana saksi saksya dila, ‘yadi tara jama samanera dike chimre thake tabe strilokati satya katha baleche ebam se purusati mithyabadidera antarbhukta.
12|27|Ara tara jama yadi pichana dika theke chimre thake tabe strilokati mithya baleche ebam se purusati satyabadidera antarbhukta.’
12|28|Atahpara grhasbami yakhana dekhala ye, tara jama pichana dika theke chemra hayeche takhana se balala, ‘niscaya eta tomadera naridera chalana, tomadera chalana to bhisana [1].
12|29|‘He i'usupha! Tumi eta upeksa kara ebam he nari! Tumi tomara aparadhera jan'ya ksama prarthana kara; tumi tumi'i to aparadhidera antarbhukta [1].’
